name: Gems Quest - Jewels Treasure
description:
Gems Quest - Jewels Treasure, classic jewel & gems crush addictive match-3 type game with lots of mysterious!

THE JOURNEY START:
Follow Archaeologist Digger exploring the ancient mysterious Egyptian pyramids.
There are many dangers in Pyramid, such as poisonous gas, magical mummies, and death.
You need to avoid these dangers to get more special gems. Don't hesitate.
Study the mysterious treasure chest.
There are ancient treasures in the chest, exploring the key to the unknown world.

GO FOR THIS ADVENTURE:
- Digging the secrets of Rune gems and unlock the treasure with gems stone.
- USE your fingers: slide, switch and match 3 or more jewels to rock pyramid world.
- Embark on egypt pyramid match 3 journey with exploring fun. Mysterious Egypt world, hundreds of well-designed free levels!
- It's aim is complete the objectives in limited moves or time. Match 3 or more identical jewels. Defeat the Death. Get Hawkeye gold coins.
- Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface. play with fictional character Egypt Queen. Continuous Elimination can get extra scores quickly.

HOW TO PLAY:
: In each level,a specific list of goals that need to be completed.
: Match 3 more identical jewels quickly and swap colorful jewels.
: Must have the sharpest mind. Learn to use special jewels or props.
: Swap two special jewel-gems, make super combination.
: Make T or L matching to get bomb gems stone.
: Match 5 gem-jewels to be Color Beetle Gem, eliminating all the same color.
: Use power-ups in tricky levels.
: Less moves, More Stars, Higher scores! Crush all jewels.
: Pass the levels and try to get all stars in each level.

Follow your friends to embark on this mysterious adventure of the Egyptian pyramid journey.
